subject: Delegation of powers to Chief General managers at Headquarters for grant of permission/recommending the access permission cases to the Ministry.
text: HRrdfu <7cfl4 <HT gfea<u T4 /Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Ma #art, #oo 4aa7 &r ToTAT 471q74) 44 /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 QA. /Extn:: 2223 2318 2468 2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) #t-5 Wa 6, #ier-10, ETGT, # fart-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/217/2007-Admn: 4.2.2009 POLICY MATTERS Administration/Finance (46/2009) [Decision taken on Administration Division's file No.1 1041/217/2007-Admn;] Sub: Delegation of powers to Chief General Managers at Headquarters for of permission/recommending the access permission cases to the Ministry In order to streamline the procedure for grant of permission recommending the access permission cases to the Ministry, it has been decided with the approval of the Chairman thaf Chief General Managers at Headquarters will henceforth be delegated with the following powers: S.No: Details of work Extant of Delegation (a) Grant of permissions for NOC for access The proposals shall be approved to private property along_NHs: by the CGMs at Headquarters and (b) Grant of permission for NOC for Retail forwarded to the Ministry in Outlets along NHs. accordance with the extant guidelines of the_Ministry: (c) Grant of  permission for  laying of OFC The proposals for grant of along_NHs: permission  shall be accorded by (d) Approval for laying of water supply the CGMs at Headquarters on pipelines along and_acrossNHs recommendations  of the Project (e) Approval for   permission of laying Gas Directors. pipelines along and across NHs Approval of crossing Of NHs by Overhead High Tension/Electric lines 2 This delegation is subject to the ceiling of financial powers delegated to the Chairman, Members Or the CGMs and the instructions issued by the Government Authority from time to time. (Rakesh Nagar) General Manager (HR) To: All Members/CGMs/CVO AIl GMs/DGMs/Managers/ Asstt. Managers All PIUs/CMUs/SPVs Copy to: PS to Chairman Hindi Officer/Librarian 71 7 NHAL grant
